summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 7.4°C) and outside temperature (down 6.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 13010 lux) and cloud levels (up 653 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14705 lux) and cloud levels (up 1603 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 653.2m lower than yesterday, 596.5m lower than the past week, 1602.7m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 1059m to 3380m and averaged 1071.0m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, humidity should not be a concern. Showers, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and low sunlight due to cloudy or overcast skies. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
